featured.text: Even so, we continue to believe that next time it will be different.
The teacher showed ______ for the noise in the classroom and continued with his lecture as if he had not heard anything.
The study warned that Papua’s glaciers are only the “first to go” if greenhouse gases are 30 and temperatures continue rising.
That technology has continued to evolve into the present.
These trees, in turn, may give rise to more sprouts, and the cycle continues.

other.text: Off the field, they continue to keep it in mind.
Few people will trust you if you continue making _____ promises and never make efforts to keep them.
To help Abate continue running, the coach arranged a motel job for him, which pays $9 a month.
2. (A) Shall we continue our discussion?
If student enrollment continues to drop, some programs at the university may be to reduce the operation costs.
While the practice continued in some parts of the country until the 1970s, it 19 as alarm clocks became more widespread and affordable.
It was then decided that Alan Shepard should relieve himself in his space suit, and continue with the mission as scheduled.
I will probably continue to be my academic self.
Before the disciple could recover from the 39 of hearing the little pig speak in a human voice, it continued, “Don’t kill me.
Her incredible story and superior swimming Brazilian government and later continued judo skills won her the opportunity to participate in the training at a youth facility.
Such dangers are now obvious in India, where the movement of the plate continues.
Like it or not, zoos will continue to exist as long as there is a demand for them.
Aboriginal carvers continue to carve totems as symbols of their cultural pride and clan kinship.
the shrinking continues, India will disappear in 200 million years.
Most young people in Taiwan are not satisfied with a high school _____ and continue to pursue further education in college.
His dark brown jacket had holes in the elbows and had _____ to light brown, but he continued to wear it.
It is not immediately known whether the “Kawasaki” can be repaired on the fishing island of Penghu, or when the Vladimirs will be able to set off again and continue their around-the-world voyage.
The island continues to recover from its 1992 visit from Iniki, the most powerful hurricane to hit Hawaii this century.
As the world population continues to grow, shortages of fresh water will occur more often and the need for additional water supplies will become critical.

But as the magic fades and daily life __(33)__, it happens that men, forgetting that men and women are supposed to be different, continue to expect women to think and react the way men do; women, __(34)__, expect men to feel and behave the way women do.
Because so many people continue to drink the many varieties of tea, it will probably continue as the world’s most popular drink.
New products continue to expand the market.
The movement continued over the years; however, the problem remains.

definition.zh_def: 繼續，持續進行某事或保持某種狀態。
definition.en_def: To persist in an activity or process without interruption.
definition.example: Please continue reading the book until you finish it.
